Types of joins: 

Joins based on the key!

- left join: keeps everything from the left and merges it with the table from the right 

- inner join: keeps everything the right and left tables have in common 

- full join: keeps all data from the left and right 

- anti join: discards any observations in the left table that do have a match in the right table

- semi join: discards any observations in the left table that do not have a match in the right table
